pullrequest.title: Improve mechanism to generate pkgconfig Libs: content (issue #1284)

content.raw: Since we don't have a `gazebo-any-devel-precise` job, I modified the [gazebo-default-devel-precise job to run this branch](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64/1165/), though I've since modified it back. That's important because there was a pkg-config test [failing on precise](http://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-default-devel-precise-amd64/1164/testReport/junit/%28root%29/PkgConfig/CC/) but not trusty.
content.html: Since we don't have a gazebo-any-devel-precise job, I modified the gazebo-default-devel-precise job to run this branch, though I've since modified it back. That's important because there was a pkg-config test failing on precise but not trusty.
